item.title: All-Party Leaders in Jogulamba Gadwal Vow to Continue Struggle Until 42% BC Reservations Are Implemented.
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: All-Party Leaders Thank Public for Supporting BC Reservation Bandh â€“ Vow to Continue Struggle Until 42% Reservations Are Achieved
Leaders of various political parties and social organizations in Jogulamba Gadwal district extended heartfelt thanks to business owners, educational institutions, police personnel, political party leaders, organizations, and individuals who cooperated with the bandh held in support of 42% reservations for Backward Classes (BCs).
Speaking at a press conferenc...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
